did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the Page and Walker Families
1742-1886

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the Page and Walker Families, Accession #3098, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was deposited by Miss Anne Page of Newport News, Virginia, on 1949 Feb 10. It was purchased by the library on 1975 May 1.
